name: Gradient Particles
description:
In this game you play the black particles,

At the start, particles will simple evaporate and condense over time,

but you can spend the points gained by condensation to create even more black particles for yourself or send evaporators to the white particles to gain even black particles through evaporation.

The game has 3 endings.

Technical Information:

The game uses compute shaders to update the particles quickly and efficiently using the GPU.
